title: UI Technical Designer
content:
As a UI Technical Designer, you will support the UI Team with technical and creative input. Working closely with UI Cross Functional Team and other departments you will create the systems that will power robust and engaging user interfaces using both Unreal Engine and our own tools.You will be joining the studio at an exciting time, as we scale up to develop an ambitious and ground-breaking game. The role brings with it great scope for career growth and the satisfaction of making a significant personal contribution to a high-profile project.We believe in iterative development, and you will need to be comfortable working in a fluid environment with competing demands. We also believe the best games are made by diverse teams, and we welcome and encourage applicants of all backgrounds.
Responsibilities:

Build the UI and HUD elements within an ambitious AAA game.
Implement effective UI-related sub systems at the right level of abstraction.
Use appropriate data structures and algorithms to maximize efficiency in terms of system performance and work.
Mentor and support team members so the whole team accomplishes their deadlines as they master their skills.
Ability to detect and clearly communicate potential risks and limitations of work.
Work closely with other departments to request and integrate required assets.
Serve as a technical point of contact for various UI features and systems you develop.

Requirements:

Extensive experience as a UI Technical Designer or similar role within the games industry.
Excellent knowledge of a technical scripting language with Lua being preferred.
Previous experience creating fully functional and visually polished user interfaces.
Solid planning skills (including dependencies on/from peers) without direct supervision.
A keen eye for detail and a drive to create polished, high-quality work.
Passion for videogames and a broad grasp of game types and systems.
Strong teamwork and communication skills.
Experience with visual scripting tools would be an advantage.

Desirable Extra Skills / Experience

Experience with Unreal Engine Blueprints.
Experience with HTML5, Adobe Illustrator, XD and/or Photoshop, etc.
A background in programming or close collaboration with programmers
